column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday April 21 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR E HIGH ST:
column4: The roadway is shutdown between S Martin Luther King Blvd and S Limestone until further notice due to a downed pole and wires.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR E HIGH ST:
column4: Traffic is being diverted to S Martin Luther King Blvd.  Motorists may also detour via Rose St.
